text: The Treaty of Berlin was signed on July 28, 1742 between Austrian archduchess Maria Theresa and Frederick II of Prussia. == Terms == Based on the treaty, Maria Theresa gave most of Silesia to Frederick. This treaty, along with the Treaty of Breslau, officially ended the First Silesian War. == Other websites == * The Columbia Encyclopedia: War of the Austrian Succession * Encyclopedia Britannica: The War of the Austrian Succession 1740-1748 Berlin 1742 Category:1740s works
title: Treaty of Berlin (1742)
